basics.name: Daniela Zapata
basics.label: Engineering Leader
basics.summary: Results-driven technology leader with 12 years of expertise spanning machine learning, artificial intelligence, and fintech domains. Demonstrated track record of scaling high-performing engineering teams and delivering complex technical solutions. As an engineering manager, successfully grew and mentored cross-functional teams from 2 to 15 engineers, establishing robust development processes and fostering a culture of technical excellence. Previously contributed as a senior/staff software engineer and technical consultant, architecting ML/AI solutions that drove measurable business outcomes. Combines deep technical acumen with strategic leadership to transform business requirements into scalable, production-ready systems while developing future engineering leaders.

work.name: M1 Finance
work.description: B2C Personal finance all in one platform
highlights: Led strategic reorganization of engineering division by consolidating three specialized squads into a high-performing unified team, resulting in improved collaboration and faster delivery cycles. Established multi-level management structure, successfully coaching a tech lead in people management while maintaining technical excellence

Demonstrated exceptional talent development capabilities by elevating two underperforming senior engineers to exceed expectations within six months through targeted mentoring, clear performance frameworks, and strategic project allocation
Maintained strategic alignment through regular executive partnerships, collaborating directly with CTO to ensure team initiatives supported company-wide objectives
Set strategic alignment through regular executive partnerships, collaborating directly with CTO to ensure team initiatives supported company-wide objectives

Spearheaded agile transformation through Basecamp ShapeUp methodology, strategically allocating 20% of sprint capacity to technical debt reduction while accelerating deployment frequency from weekly to daily releases. Orchestrated six-week delivery cycles with dedicated cooldown periods, enabling teams to tackle high-impact refactoring projects and reduce legacy code complexity. This approach reduced production incidents, while decreasing mean time to recovery by 20% through implementation of comprehensive runbooks and clear service ownership protocols

work.name: M1 Finance
highlights: Designed career ladders and growth frameworks for IC and management tracks, resulting in 80% of of my direct reports advancing in level or scope within 18 months
Conducted weekly 1:1s and quarterly performance reviews for 8 direct reports
Architected and led development of self-clearing platform, reducing operational costs by 60%
Managed strategic transition from third-party clearing partner while maintaining system stability
Scaled my engineering team by 650% while maintaining high performance standards and pairing engineers for growth
Founded and led company's first engineering internship program, achieving 70% conversion rate from intern to full-time hires

work.name: M1 Finance
highlights: Led technical architecture and implementation of critical investment platform components spanning one monolithic application and four microservices, processing $100M+ in daily transactions, while emerging as a strategic team leader
Onboarded and mentored 5 engineers in 4 months, reducing ramp-up time by 40%
Created comprehensive technical documentation and architecture decision records
Led technical design reviews and established code review standards
Built ACAT transfer system supporting both inbound and outbound asset movements
Upgraded the ACH transfer pipeline, increasing transfer success rate by 25%

work.description: Predictive Analytics Platform using Machine Learning to Deliver Actionable Insights and Prevent Asset Failures
work.summary: As a data scientist, I led the wind turbine ML/AI team, creating models and automating processes that could be repeatable by offshore consultants

work.name: Uptake
work.summary: Built a training and scoring platform to allow data scientists to deploy their models to production
highlights: Bootstrapped new PlatformX from scratch, serving client data within a year

Owned 10+ micro-services in a multi-tenant environment forming a streaming ecosystem to score 3 types of models: Failure Engine, Anomaly Detection, Outlier using PFA/Hadrian runner and in house Python runner
Implemented model manager, self-service model deployment platform for model owners, designing 15+ database entities
Led agile ceremonies such as standup and retro, documented meetings, created and managed action items
Supported whole ecosystem, troubleshooting, fixing and being on call during emergency rotations
Demoed team accomplishments to stakeholders and drove product roadmap quarterly

work.name: Uptake
work.summary: Implemented and deployed an anomaly detection machine learning algorithm based on dimensionality reduction, PCA and autoencoders, in tight collaboration with data scientists
highlights: Implemented Machine Learning Anomaly Detection PCA algorithm in Scala and Spark
Led a team of 5 engineers and constructed the product roadmap in collaboration with other stakeholders
Conducted all agile ceremonies and represented the team in sprint demos
Owned training of Spark Outlier models, experimented with Spark testing libraries, spiked and implemented the solution as the sole developer
Spearheaded the engineering intern hiring process in collaboration with HR, mentored and ramped up 2 interns that became full time employees

highlights: Portal and Portlet development for clients and Liferay Core FOSS. Specialized in SOLR search enhancements. Major clients include: Nintendo of America, Aon Hewitt, VMware
Implemented import/export framework for staging infrastructure
Upgraded SOLR and Lucene integrations for new architecture and implemented new spell check/query suggest feature
